common.selectSitePrompt: Select a site from the toolbar

login.title: OpenYapper
login.subtitle: Enter your API key to access the admin dashboard

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.selectSitePrompt: Select a site from the toolbar to see content stats.
dashboard.readOnlyNotice: You have read-only access. Content is visible but cannot be modified.
dashboard.noPostsCreate: No blog posts yet. Create your first post!
dashboard.noDrafts: No drafts — all content is published or in review.
dashboard.noSitesCreate: Create your first site to get started

myDrafts.title: My Drafts
myDrafts.subtitle: All draft content in one place

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to view drafts
empty.title: No drafts
empty.description: All your content is published or scheduled — nothing in draft.

blogs.title: Blogs
blogs.subtitle: Manage blog posts across your sites

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to view its blog posts
empty.title: No blog posts yet
empty.description: Blog posts are the backbone of your content. Write articles, tutorials, or news — each with translations, categories, and SEO metadata.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Blog
deleteDialog.message: Delete blog "{{slug}}"? This cannot be undone.

blogDetail.title: Blog Detail
blogDetail.noLocalesAlert: No active locales configured. Go to Settings → Locales and create at least one active locale (e.g. "en") to start writing blog content.

documents.title: Attached Documents
documents.emptyDescription: Attach documents to this blog post

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to view its pages
empty.title: No pages yet
empty.description: Pages are the building blocks of your site. Create landing pages, about sections, or any custom layout with modular sections.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Page
deleteDialog.message: Delete page "{{route}}"? This cannot be undone.

sections.title: Sections
sections.emptyDescription: Add sections to build your page layout
sections.deleteMessage: Delete this {{type}} section? This cannot be undone.

media.title: Media
media.subtitle: Manage media files across your sites
media.searchPlaceholder: Search by filename, alt text, caption, title...

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to view its media files
empty.title: No media yet
empty.description: Upload and manage images, videos, and documents. Media files can be attached to blog posts, pages, and sections.
empty.noMatchDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters

upload.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to browse

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to view its documents
empty.title: No documents yet
empty.description: Manage downloadable files like PDFs, whitepapers, or guides. Documents can be linked to blog posts and pages.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Document
deleteDialog.message: Delete document "{{title}}"? This cannot be undone.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.subtitle: Manage navigation items for your sites

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its navigation
empty.title: No navigation items yet
empty.description: Define how visitors navigate your site. Create menus with links to pages or external URLs, organized in a hierarchy.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Navigation Item
deleteDialog.message: Delete this navigation item? This will also delete its localizations.

socialLinks.title: Social Links
socialLinks.subtitle: Manage social media links for your sites

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its social links
empty.title: No social links yet
empty.description: Add links to your social media profiles. These are served via the API so your frontend can display them anywhere.

taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
taxonomy.subtitle: Manage tags and categories for your sites

info.tags: Tags are flat labels you attach to content — like hashtags. A post can have many tags (e.g. "rust", "tutorial", "docker"). Use them for filtering and cross-cutting topics.
info.categories: Categories form a hierarchy (tree). Use them to group content structurally, e.g. "Technology > Web Development > React". Each post typically belongs to one category.

empty.title: No tags yet
empty.description: Tags are flat labels for cross-cutting topics — like hashtags. Assign multiple tags per post (e.g. "rust", "tutorial") so visitors can filter and discover content.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Tag
deleteDialog.message: Delete tag "{{slug}}"? This will deactivate the tag.

empty.title: No categories yet
empty.description: Categories create a tree-like hierarchy for your content. Group related posts under branches like "Technology > Web Development" for structured navigation.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Category
deleteDialog.message: Delete category "{{slug}}"? This will deactivate the category.

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its taxonomy

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.subtitle: Notify external services when content changes

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its webhooks
empty.title: No webhooks yet
empty.description: Webhooks notify external services when content is created, updated, or deleted. Use them to trigger builds, sync data, or send notifications.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Webhook
deleteDialog.message: Delete webhook for "{{url}}"? This cannot be undone.

deliveries.title: Delivery Log
deliveries.emptyDescription: Deliveries will appear here after the webhook fires.

redirects.title: Redirects
redirects.subtitle: Manage URL redirects for your sites

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its redirects
empty.title: No redirects yet
empty.description: Set up URL redirects to keep old links working when content moves. Use 301 for permanent moves and 302 for temporary ones.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Redirect
deleteDialog.message: Delete redirect for "{{source}}"? This cannot be undone.

empty.title: No languages yet
empty.description: Languages enable multilingual content. Add the languages you want to support — each piece of content can then be translated.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Language
deleteDialog.message: Delete language "{{code}}"? This cannot be undone.

errors.inUse: Cannot delete: language is assigned to one or more sites

members.title: Members
members.subtitle: Manage site members and their roles

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its members
empty.title: No team members yet
empty.description: Invite collaborators to help manage this site. Assign roles like Editor, Author, or Reviewer to control access.

removeDialog.title: Remove Member
removeDialog.message: Remove this member from the site? They will lose all access.

transferDialog.title: Transfer Ownership
transferDialog.message: Transfer site ownership to {{name}}? You will be demoted to Admin.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage API keys for accessing the backend

empty.title: No API keys yet
empty.description: API keys let external applications access your content. Create keys with specific permission levels and site scopes.

blockDialog.title: Block API Key
blockDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Why is this key being blocked?

revokeDialog.title: Revoke API Key
revokeDialog.message: Are you sure you want to revoke "{{name}}"? This is permanent and cannot be undone.

deleteDialog.title: Delete API Key
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{name}}"?

created.title: API Key Created
created.warning: Copy this key now. You won't be able to see it again!

cv.title: CV / Resume
cv.subtitle: Manage CV entries and skills for your sites

empty.title: No CV entries yet
empty.description: Add your work experience, education, and other career milestones. Entries are served via the API for your portfolio.

deleteDialog.title: Delete CV Entry
deleteDialog.message: Delete "{{company}}" entry? This cannot be undone.

empty.title: No skills yet
empty.description: List your technical and professional skills with proficiency levels and categories for your portfolio.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Skill
deleteDialog.message: Delete skill "{{name}}"? This cannot be undone.

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its CV data

legal.title: Legal Documents
legal.subtitle: Manage legal documents for your sites

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its legal documents
empty.title: No legal documents yet
empty.description: Manage cookie consents, privacy policies, and other legal requirements. Group items for structured consent banners.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Legal Document
deleteDialog.message: Delete legal document "{{cookieName}}"? This will also delete its groups and items.

groups.title: Groups
groups.emptyDescription: Add the first group to this legal document
groups.deleteMessage: Delete group "{{name}}"? This will also delete all items in this group.

items.title: Items
items.deleteMessage: Delete item "{{name}}"? This cannot be undone.

sites.title: Sites
sites.subtitle: Manage your websites and their configuration

empty.title: No sites yet
empty.description: Sites are the foundation of your CMS. Each site has its own content, languages, navigation, and settings.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Site
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Site configuration and system information
settings.selectSiteAlert: Select a site from the header to manage its settings.

featureToggles.title: Feature Toggles
featureToggles.editorialWorkflowDescription: Require content review before publishing. Authors must submit for review, reviewers approve or request changes.

preview.title: Preview Templates
preview.description: Configure dev server URLs for live preview
preview.name: Template name

systemInfo.localesMovedDescription: Languages are now managed on their own dedicated page.

language.label: Admin Language
language.description: Choose the display language for the admin interface

onboarding.subtitle: Your headless CMS for multi-site, multilingual content management.
onboarding.description: Create your first site to start managing pages, blog posts, media, and more — all served through a powerful REST API.

features.multiSiteDesc: Manage multiple websites from a single dashboard with independent content and settings.
features.multilingualDesc: Built-in localization with support for any language and RTL text direction.
features.apiFirstDesc: Headless architecture with a full REST API. Deliver content to any frontend.

setupChecklist.title: Getting Started
setupChecklist.description: Complete these steps to set up your site and start publishing content.
setupChecklist.completeDescription: You've completed all setup steps. You're ready to publish!

activity.title: Activity
activity.subtitle: Audit log of all changes on this site
activity.emptyDescription: Actions like creating, updating, and deleting content will appear here.

entityHistory.title: History
entityHistory.revertConfirmMessage: Revert the following fields to their previous values?

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved Changes
unsavedChanges.message: You have unsaved changes. Discard and leave?

fields.name: Name
fields.initialLanguagesHelper: Select at least one language for your site

validation.minOneLocale: At least one language is required
validation.exactlyOneDefault: Exactly one language must be set as default

fields.slugHelper: URL-friendly identifier — lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens (e.g. "my-tag")
fields.globalHelper: Global tags are shared across all sites. Site-specific tags belong only to the current site.

fields.slugHelper: URL-friendly identifier — lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens (e.g. "web-development")
fields.globalHelper: Global categories are shared across all sites. Site-specific categories belong only to the current site.
fields.parentHelper: Nest this category under a parent to build a hierarchy (e.g. Technology > Web Development)

fields.urlHelper: The endpoint that will receive POST requests with event data
fields.eventsHelper: Leave empty to receive all events

fields.sourcePathHelper: The URL path to redirect from (e.g. /old-page)
fields.destinationPathHelper: Where to redirect to (path or full URL)

autosave.retryFailed: Auto-save failed after multiple attempts. Try saving manually with Ctrl+S.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred on this page.

navigationGuard.title: Unsaved changes
navigationGuard.message: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account, security settings, and data
profile.dataPrivacyInfo: You can export all your data stored in the CMS or permanently delete your account. Exported data includes your profile, audit logs, API keys, and change history.
profile.deleteAccountMessage: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Your Clerk account will be deleted and all associated CMS data will be anonymized. Are you sure you want to proceed?

siteLocales.title: Languages

addDialog.title: Add Language
addDialog.urlPrefixHelper: e.g. en, de, fr (used in URLs)

siteLocales.empty: No languages assigned to this site yet.

workflow.cannotPublish: Editorial workflow is enabled. Submit content for review to publish.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.noSite: Select a site to view notifications

deleteDialog.title: Delete Selected Items
deleteDialog.message: Delete {{count}} selected items? This cannot be undone.

contentTemplates.title: Content Templates
contentTemplates.subtitle: Manage reusable content templates for your sites

empty.noSite: Select a site from the toolbar to manage its templates
empty.title: No templates yet
empty.description: Create reusable content templates to speed up blog post creation. Templates include pre-filled content, metadata, and settings.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Template
deleteDialog.message: Delete template "{{name}}"? This cannot be undone.

templates.dialogSubtitle: Choose a template to get started with pre-filled content structure.

tutorial.name: Tutorial
tutorial.description: Step-by-step guide with prerequisites, numbered steps, and further reading.

changelog.name: Changelog
changelog.description: Release notes with features, bug fixes, breaking changes, and migration guide.

review.name: Review
review.description: Product or tool review with key features, pros, cons, and verdict.

announcement.name: Announcement
announcement.description: News announcement with significance, next steps, and call to action.

markdownImport.dialogSubtitle: Upload a Markdown file to create a new blog post. The H1 heading will become the title.
markdownImport.dropZone: Drag and drop a .md file here, or click to browse

errors.noH1: Markdown must contain exactly one H1 heading (# Title)
errors.multipleH1: Markdown contains multiple H1 headings. Use only one.
errors.titleTooLong: Title exceeds maximum length of {{max}} characters
errors.bodyTooLong: Body exceeds maximum length of {{max}} characters
